title: Rengar bug on pbe
body: currently a bug on pbe where rengars abilities dont go on cool down

replies.body:
Hey sorens 

Just checked this on PBE, and cooldowns are working properly. 

In the future, please report PBE-related issues on the PBE boards, so we can better track live bugs v. PBE bugs. ^-^
oops sorry forgot about the pbe boards, but here is a better explanation http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bugs/qA8rbniZ-strange-rengar-bug

Ahhh okay. All of that info would have been much more helpful in getting a repro, haha. Lemme take another look.

**EDIT**: We're on it - shouldn't find its way to live.

There was another bug on live with rengo jsut happened once and i cant explain how to reproduce it :

I throw my e after R with 5 stacks got instant 5 stacks cz of another e w q and the generation from my ultimate
but instead of throwing e again it was greyed out like on cooldown ( but with 5 stacks my abilitys never have cooldown)

seems very rare jsut happened once 
would be nice if it never occurs again
Pretty sure he is talking about this cd bug, Which was reported 2 days ago with no reply.http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bugs/qA8rbniZ-strange-rengar-bug
